songs.title: Arrow (Kids Want Techno, Michael Mason & Olan Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
I can't go on this way
Another lover
Lost in head space
And I can't breathe
Above the surface
I can't sleep

[Pre-Chorus]
Hold on
Here we go
Last chance
Arrow

[Instrumental Hook]

[Chorus]
I'll be there
The light of the sun
Always falling in love
I'll be there
The light of the sun
Always falling in love

[Verse]
I can't go on this way
Another lover
Lost in head space
And I can't breathe
Above the surface
I can't sleep

[Pre-Chorus]
Hold on
Here we go
Last chance
Arrow

[Instrumental Hook]
